Heraeus Mat erials Singapore  Pte Ltd

o Responsible for the sales of heterogenous  cataly sts and recove ry of precious metals to

Air Liquide Singapor e Pte Ltd  
Sales Manager,  Sept 2014  - Oct 2016  
o Responsible for the sales of  on-sites, liquid bulk, packaged gases and chemical s to key

o Accountable for  S$14 million  in annual sales.  
o Supervises a regional team consisting of 4 sales representatives who collectively has a 
total portfolio of S$46 million  in annual sales from both Singapore and Malaysia.  Executive Summary
